thread.title: Local TV Creates Hurdle to Streaming
thread.title_full: Local TV Creates Hurdle to Streaming

title: Local TV Creates Hurdle to Streaming
text:
Media & Marketing Local TV Creates Hurdle to Streaming The difficulty of lining up deals to offer CBS, ABC, NBC and Fox programming is one reason Apple has decided to push back its Web-TV service By Keach.Hagey@wsj.com Sept. 3, 2015 8:09 p.m. ET 
As Sony Corp. was ramping up its Playstation Vue streaming television service that launched in March, it hammered out a deal with 21st Century Fox to pick up the signals of Fox’s local TV stations. 
Then this summer, as Sony looked to expand the service nationwide, Fox proposed a way to add the nearly 200 affiliate stations that carry Fox network programming but that the company doesn’t own. 
The board that represents those... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
